Summary: A silver with red lights oval or cigar.
divs: Sighting Detailsit has been a while since this happened but i feel i should share it was some time in November or October last year '08 i was standing in my back yard watching my dog mess around when i noticed a cigar or oval shaped object come into view not very far away or high in the air it was covering quite a bit of sky then my dog a mini schnauzer stared growling at something behind our work shed she was bent like she was about to attack something i yelled "who's there" then my dog took a couple steps forward still looking angry started to back down and almost look she was in pain then i heard something move behind it again then i'm not making this up a four to four and half foot grayish green more grey than green alien ran out looked at me as it ran and went behind this huge bush we have then there was a huge gust of wind the ship was gone when i opened my eyes and i feel on my but with my mouth opened i must have just stared at nothing for hours i was so scared i went back inside and it was 2 i went out there at 1130 but it all happened in 5 mins it toke me 2 days to stop shaking i would like to remain anonymous but email me and ill talk
